name: Dagger
description: ?? A lightweight, razor-edged dagger forged for assassins  slim, balanced, and built for lethal efficiency. Its ergonomic handle and whisper-silent profile make it easy to conceal, while the keen double edge delivers precise, devastating strikes in close quarters. ?

name: Falchion Knife
description: ?? A sleek, curved blade built for swift cuts and smooth handling. Its distinct shape allows for fast, flowing attacks, making it a stylish yet deadly sidearm favored by agile fighters. ?

name: Gladius Daggers
description: ?? Twin daggers shaped after the iconic Roman Gladius. Short, sharp, and perfectly balanced for rapid thrusts  combining ancient design with modern lethality. ?

name: Hook
description: ?? A sharp, lightweight weapon shaped like an S. Typically used for butchery, but can be used as a deadly melee weapon. ?

name: Falchion Sword
description: ?? A curved, single-edged sword that bridges the gap between nimble daggers and heavy greatswords. Its sweeping slashes flow smoothly from one to the next, rewarding clean spacing, smart footwork, and constant pressure. ?

name: Gladius Sword
description: ?? The most deadly sword according to experts during the Roman Empire. Its double-edged design facilitates thrusts in close combat. ?

name: Cutlass
description: ?? A curved, broad-bladed sword favored by sailors and privateers. Its sweeping cuts and balanced weight make it quick to handle, deadly in tight quarters, and effortlessly intimidating. ?

name: Rapier
description: ?? A slender, needle-point blade built for precision and speed. Designed for swift thrusts and surgical strikes, the rapier pierces armor gaps with ease, rewarding accuracy over brute strength. ?

name: Chaos
description: ?? A jagged, brutal blade said to echo the fury of a fallen god. Its wild curvature delivers unpredictable, bone-shattering strikes, tearing through anything caught in its path. ?

name: Crusader Sword
description: ?? A weighty greatsword carried by battle-worn crusaders. Each swing carves a wide arc through the air, trading speed for reach, power, and unwavering frontline presence. ?

name: Long Sword
description: ?? A reliable, battle-tested blade known for its balance of reach and control. The Long Sword delivers steady, decisive cuts, offering both offense and defense to any fighter who values versatility over brute force or speed. ?

name: Ironhand
description: ?? A reinforced gauntlet that turns a Forger's fist into a battering ram. Every punch lands with heavy impact, trading reach for raw, close-range stopping power. ?

name: Boxing Gloves
description: ï¿½ Lightweight gauntlets designed for speed and agility. Less durable but easier to punch with, perfect for quick combos. ?

name: Relevator
description: ?? Heavy-duty gauntlets designed to maximize punching power. Slower than other gauntlets but deals devastating damage. ?

name: Uchigatana
description: ?? A finely tempered katana built for precise, flowing strikes. Its razor-thin edge and long reach reward clean spacing, quick reactions, and relentless offensive pressure.

name: Tachi
description: ?? A gracefully curved, finely tempered blade crafted for sweeping strikes and fluid motion. The Tachi excels in fast-paced combat, cutting with elegant power while maintaining deadly precision in every arc. ?

name: Double Battle Axe
description: ?? A brutal twin-headed battle axe built to shatter shields and break enemy lines. Every swing is slow and committing, but when it lands, it carves a vicious path through anything caught in its arc.

name: Scythe
description: ?? A long, sweeping blade forged for wide, harvesting arcs. The Scythe excels at controlling space, carving through foes with elegant, reaping strikes that cut from impossible angles. ?

name: Great Sword
description: ?? A broad, heavy blade forged for raw impact  each swing carrying enough weight to break shields, stagger foes, and carve a path through even the toughest defenses. ?

name: Forge Hammer
description: ?? A colossal forge hammer that turns every swing into a crater. Its crushing blows are slow and deliberate, but anything caught under the head is left shattered, staggered, or broken outright.

name: Skull Crusher
description: ?? A brutally heavy war hammer engineered to shatter armor and bone alike. Its reinforced twin heads deliver crushing force with every swing, making it a fearsome weapon in the hands of those strong enough to wield it. ?

name: Dragon Slayer
description: ?? A colossal slab of iron forged not for elegance, but for annihilation. Swung by a warrior who carved his legend through darkness itself, this blade delivers crushing, unstoppable strikes that feel more like a falling tower than a sword. ?

name: Comically Large Spoon
description: ?? An absurdly oversized utensil swung with surprising force  ridiculous in concept, yet undeniably effective when used to smack threats into submission with comedic brutality. ?
